stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, if the Runner does not have at least 2 cards in the grip and 6 credits, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and swap 1 of those cards with 1 card in HQ. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, if the Runner does not have at least 2 cards in the grip and 6[credit], you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and swap 1 of those cards with 1 card in HQ. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Nihongai Grid
